query: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.slug, c.parentId FROM categories c LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON c.id = pc.categoryId GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug, c.parentId HAVING COUNT(pc.productId) = 0 ORDER BY c.parentId, c.name;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT c.id, c.name, c.slug, c.parentId FROM categories c LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON c.id = pc.categoryId GROUP BY c.id, c.name, c.slug, c.parentId HAVING COUNT(pc.productId) = 0 ORDER BY c.parentId, c.name;
